data.title: The legacy of Pim Fortuyn
data.meta_description: The supporters of Pim Fortuyn, the murdered maverick right-winger, look like getting some, but by no means all, of the tough anti-immigrant measures they have been seeking from the new Dutch government | News
data.text:
The supporters of Pim Fortuyn, the murdered maverick right-winger, look like getting some, but by no means all, of the tough anti-immigrant measures they have been seeking from the new Dutch government

Jul 4th 2002|

AP
